com.ibm.disni.rdma

类 RdmaServerEndpoint<C extends RdmaEndpoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.disni.rdma.RdmaServerEndpoint<C>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DiSNIServerEndpoint<C>

    public class RdmaServerEndpoint<C extends RdmaEndpoint>
extends Object
implements DiSNIServerEndpoint<C>
    This class represent a server endpoint. Conceptually it is similar to a server socket providing operations like bind() and accept().

      • bind

        public RdmaServerEndpoint<C> bind(SocketAddress src,
                                  int backlog)
                           throws Exception
        Bind this server endpoint to a specific IP address / port.
        指定者:
        bind 在接口中 DiSNIServerEndpoint<C extends RdmaEndpoint>
        参数:
        src - (rdma://host:port)
        返回:
        the rdma server endpoint
        抛出:
        Exception - the exception

        指定者:

        参数:
        dispatcher - used to signal the completion of the accept call.

      • registerMemory

        public SVCRegMr registerMemory(ByteBuffer buffer)
                        throws IOException
        Register memory on this endpoint.
        参数:
        buffer - the buffer to be registered. The buffer needs to represent off-heap memory.
        返回:
        a stateful verb call (SVC) ready to execute the memory registration.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure
        IOException

      • deregisterMemory

        public void deregisterMemory(IbvMr mr)
                      throws IOException
        Deregister memory.
        参数:
        mr - the memory region to be de-registered.
        抛出:
        Exception - on failure.
        IOException
